attributes.title: The Birds are watching
attributes.review: It has been brought to my attention that this app is actually what the Great Trumpkin and his administration have been using to control the birds that work for the bourgeoisie. It looks and functions like what it is advertised on the App Store (though very poorly) but upon further investigation, these rumors appear to be true. Anyone who has this app is being monitored by their own personal spy pigeon (along with their FBI agent of course). This is clearly an invasion of privacy and therefore, needs to be removed from this App Store. For goodness sake, CHILDREN can download this app. If it is not taken down soon, I will have to formally request to speak to your manger.

attributes.title: This is the slowest and worst app
attributes.review: It took a WEEK to download this app a WHOLE WEEK which is unbelievable and while it was downloading it slowed down all of my other apps and made it impossible to connect to the internet! Once it finally downloaded it immediately asked for all of my personal information including my social security number! Once I filled out what was non-invasive it deleted everything on my phone and took all my personal information anyway!! If I could give this app 0 stars I would, I am absolutely outraged by the fact that this app is still up and running and I demand that it should be taken down!!!

attributes.title: America is not built on censorship
attributes.review: The image that the president portrays to the public is one of sexual harrasment and hate and racist beliefs towards minorities, such as Mexican immigrants. This country is not built on the idea that you or anyone can control the idea of how the people speak, suppressing our rights is truly what will make you more and more unimpressive as a whole. If it were possible to leave a negative number of stars I would make sure to as censorship and sexual assault is not what anyone deserves in a president. This app also acts as a propaganda chain from the White House to his small loyal followers with false information about what he will actually carry out if re-elected

When I got back on it was rearranged and I finally decided to delete it before anything could happen.

attributes.title: An awful experience!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to learn more about trump‚Äôs campaign for the year 2020 but that‚Äôs not what I got! Instead I was asked to give them all my personal information to make an account. When I provided them with my information, I got a black screen and no content from the app. But that‚Äôs not it. The same week I downloaded the app, a ton of roaches ran into my room. I mean, a TON. And they all came in through the window. Wearing MAGA hats! I felt so attacked and so afraid, and I know this app is the cause of it! Don‚Äôt download or you‚Äôll be subjected to roaches being sent to your house, and the other this depicted in other reviews!
